title: Bugged ranked promotional games
body:
Good day,

I did encoutered a problem/bug in my my ranked promotional games.

I did play first game of my promos, which resulted in /remake. After the game - I was still on my first try in promos (first yellow dot in Ranked Leagues of three dots)
Again I played an another match, which resulted in loss. After the match - I was told that I did failed my promo series - DonÂ´t know why? I did failed only one mach of three?

I send links to match history.

Remake: http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1748841248/217229019?tab=overview
Defeat: http://matchhistory.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUN1/1748841833/217229019?tab=overview

I had the same problem a week ago, when in my promos I lost 1 match & win 1 match - And again... failed my promos.

I hope that the issue will be resolved as soon as possible.

Have a nice day.

replies.body: Hmmmm I'm looking over your ranked history now and it looks like there was a queue dodge in between those two losses. [**Queue dodges**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760) will also count as a loss for ranked matches, so always make sure you're prepared to follow through with matches when you Q up.
